. Seasonal - weekends only in the spring and fall.  Large amusement park with ten roller-coasters, numerous thrill rides, and an expansive water park for those sweltering summer days. A major attraction in Greater Springfield.
.  State Park located on the Westfield River.  Picnicking, mountain biking, hiking, walking, swimming.

value: content=The 911 is a tiny little "hole-in-the-wall" restaurant on the corner of North West Street and North Westfield Street. Despite its small size and out-of-the-way location, The 911 has the best burgers and hot dogs in all of Agawam, possibly in the entire Pioneer Valley. The menu isn't much more complicated than that, but the food that they do have is outstanding.
